definition: to inspect/to review/to read/to peruse/to go through/to experience

sentences.english: Shall we go through the drawings together?
sentences.chinese: 我们可以一起审阅这套设计图吗？

sentences.english: The panel of judges looked through more than 43, 000 entries to this year's competition.
sentences.chinese: 今年评委小组审阅了43000多幅参赛作品。

sentences.english: The teacher is reading Tom's English paper.
sentences.chinese: 老师正在审阅汤姆的英语答卷。

sentences.english: The Id is also refereed to the pleasure principle, which also represents self-gratification.
sentences.chinese: 该ID还审阅的快乐原则，这也代表了自我满足。

sentences.english: We shall go through these papers together.
sentences.chinese: 我们将在一起审阅这些论文。

sentences.english: If you're not reviewing the failures, the tests become meaningless.
sentences.chinese: 如果您不审阅这些失败，那么测试就没有意义了。

sentences.english: The quality unit(s) should review and approve all appropriate quality-related documents.
sentences.chinese: 质量部门应审阅批准所有适宜的质量相关文件。

sentences.english: I read the book in proof.
If a review is finished, the event handler decrements this variable.
sentences.chinese: 如果审阅完成，事件处理程序会对此变量进行递减。

sentences.english: Review and check all receiving reports from receiving matching with purchase order or market list.
sentences.chinese: 审阅所有收货记录使之与订货单及市场采购单相一致。

sentences.english: In a loop, we start one instance of this event handler for each reviewer.
sentences.chinese: 在循环中，将为每个审阅人员启动此事件的一个实例。

sentences.english: Thank you FOR the trouble you have taken in reading over the manuscript FOR me.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢你不厌其烦地替我审阅这个稿子。

sentences.english: We are currently reviewing your application.
sentences.chinese: 我们此时正在审阅你们的申请书。

sentences.english: Review, investigation and input of back page item.
sentences.chinese: 审阅，调查和输入每日收入对帐表科目。

sentences.english: The author would also like to thank all his colleagues who patiently reviewed this article and gave valuable feedback.
sentences.chinese: 作者还要感谢所有审阅本文并提出宝贵意见的同事。

sentences.english: Review general ledger and Financial Reports.
sentences.chinese: 审阅总分类帐和财务报告。

definition: to read through to evaluate/to referee
to examine sth and make a decision/to screen/to evaluate/to approve
to annotate/to add marginal comments on/criticism/marginalia
to mark (homework, exam scripts etc)/to correct and criticize (an article)/to check/to correct/a correction (to a piece of writing)
first draft/to draw up (a first version)
